mapper.insert: insert into scheduling (id, SchedDate, DeptId, UserId, Noon, RegistQuota, State) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{scheddate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{deptid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{noon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{registquota,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update scheduling set SchedDate = #{scheddate,jdbcType=DATE}, DeptId = #{deptid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, UserId = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Noon = #{noon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RegistQuota = #{registquota,jdbcType=INTEGER}, State = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, SchedDate, DeptId, UserId, Noon, RegistQuota, State from scheduling
